# LEADR Docs

> Documentation for LEADR - the cross-platform leaderboard backend for indie game developers

Key topics: leaderboard, game backend, game development, Godot, Unity, Unreal, cross-platform

Visit docs.leadr.gg for more information.

## Documentation

- [Quick Start](https://docs.leadr.gg/quick_start/): Quick start guide
- [Overview](https://docs.leadr.gg/)
- [Features](https://docs.leadr.gg/features/)
- [Self Host](https://docs.leadr.gg/self_host/)
- [Concepts](https://docs.leadr.gg/concepts/)
- [SDKs](https://docs.leadr.gg/sdks/)
- [Roadmap](https://docs.leadr.gg/roadmap/)
- [Changelog](https://docs.leadr.gg/changelog/)
- [About](https://docs.leadr.gg/about/): About the organization

For full sitemap, see: https://docs.leadr.gg/latest/sitemap.xml
